price: Ԑberε a ͻhyehyεε wͻn nneεma no wieeε no, ͻka kyerεε wͻn sε: “Ɛyε a momfa monua a ͻwͻ mopapa hͻ no mmrε me. Monhunuu sε mahyε (mo nneεma) no ama ayε mma, na meyε obi a menim ahͻhosom paa?”
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمۡ قَالَ ٱئۡتُونِي بِأَخٖ لَّكُم مِّنۡ أَبِيكُمۡۚ أَلَا تَرَوۡنَ أَنِّيٓ أُوفِي ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَأَنَا۠ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim qāla i'tūnī bi-akhin lakum min abīkum alā tarawna annī ūfī al-kayla wa-anā khayru al-munzilīna
